name: Reflect
description: Reflect is an AI-powered note-taking app that helps users capture, organize, and connect ideas through networked notes and intelligent features.
longDescription: Reflect is a modern note-taking platform designed to mimic the way the human brain works by creating a networked system of notes with automatic backlinks, enabling users to build a personal knowledge graph. Its mission is to enhance productivity and creativity by making it easy to capture thoughts, organize information, and retrieve insights quickly. The app integrates AI to provide features like auto-completion, summarization, and idea generation, solving common problems in traditional note-taking such as information silos and forgetfulness. It serves professionals, students, and creatives who need a flexible tool for managing complex ideas and daily tasks. By combining simplicity with powerful AI-driven tools, Reflect helps users turn scattered notes into actionable knowledge. Overall, it positions itself as an 'everything app' for thinking, blending note-taking with task management and AI assistance.
features: Networked notes with automatic backlinks allow users to connect ideas seamlessly, creating a web of knowledge that enhances recall and discovery.
AI-powered auto-completion suggests relevant content as you type, speeding up note creation and reducing writer's block.
Daily notes feature provides a chronological journaling system that integrates with calendars for effortless daily planning and reflection.
Task management integration enables users to turn notes into actionable to-dos with reminders and priorities, streamlining workflow.
End-to-end encryption ensures all notes are secure and private, giving users peace of mind for sensitive information.
Graph view visualizes note connections, helping users see relationships and patterns in their knowledge base.
AI summarization condenses long notes or articles into key points, saving time on review and analysis.
Seamless syncing across devices keeps notes up-to-date on web, desktop, and mobile platforms.
Template library offers pre-built structures for common note types like meetings or projects, accelerating setup.
Integration with tools like calendars and browsers allows importing data directly into notes for a unified experience.
Voice-to-text transcription converts spoken ideas into written notes using AI, ideal for on-the-go capture.
Search functionality powered by AI delivers relevant results quickly, even for vague queries.
Collaboration features enable sharing notes with teams while maintaining version control and privacy settings.

faqs.question: What makes Reflect different from other note-taking apps?
faqs.answer: Reflect stands out with its networked notes and automatic backlinks, creating a dynamic knowledge graph unlike linear apps like Evernote. It also integrates AI for features like auto-completion and summarization, enhancing productivity.

faqs.question: Does Reflect offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Reflect provides a free plan with core features like unlimited notes and basic AI tools, though advanced features and storage may require a paid subscription.

faqs.question: How does the AI in Reflect work?
faqs.answer: Reflect uses AI models like GPT to offer auto-suggestions, content summarization, and idea generation directly within notes. Users can prompt the AI for tasks like brainstorming or rewriting text, making it a smart assistant embedded in your note-taking workflow.

faqs.question: Is Reflect secure for sensitive information?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Reflect employs end-to-end encryption for all data, ensuring that only you can access your notes. It also complies with privacy standards and doesn't use your data for training AI models without consent.

faqs.question: Can I use Reflect offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, the desktop and mobile apps support offline access, allowing you to create and edit notes without internet. Changes sync automatically once you're back online.

faqs.question: What devices is Reflect available on?
faqs.answer: Reflect works on web browsers, macOS, Windows, iOS, and Android, providing a consistent experience across all platforms.

faqs.question: How do backlinks work in Reflect?
faqs.answer: Backlinks are automatically created when you link to another note, showing bidirectional connections. This helps in discovering related ideas and building a personal wiki-like structure.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Reflect with other tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, Reflect integrates with calendars, email, and browsers for importing data, and supports APIs for custom workflows with tools like Zapier.

faqs.question: What is the graph view in Reflect?
faqs.answer: The graph view visualizes your notes as interconnected nodes, allowing you to explore relationships and navigate your knowledge base intuitively.

faqs.question: How much does Reflect cost?
faqs.answer: Reflect's paid plans start at around $10 per month, offering unlimited AI usage, advanced features, and priority support. The free plan is suitable for basic needs.

faqs.question: Is Reflect suitable for teams?
faqs.answer: While primarily designed for individuals, Reflect supports shared notes and collaboration, making it viable for small teams. Enterprise features are available for larger organizations.

faqs.question: How do I get started with Reflect?
faqs.answer: Sign up on the website with your email, and you'll get instant access to the app. Tutorials and templates are provided to help you begin capturing notes right away.
